明.definition: bright; opposite: dark 暗[an4]; (of meaning) clear; to understand; next; public or open; wise; generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

明了.definition: to understand clearly; to be clear about; plain; clear; also written 明瞭|明了[ming2 liao3]

明亮.definition: bright; shining; glittering; to become clear

明人不做暗事.pinyin: ming2 ren2 bu4 zuo4 an4 shi4
明人不做暗事.definition: an honest person does not act surreptitiously (idiom)

明仁.definition: Akihito, personal name of the Heisei 平成[Ping2 cheng2] emperor of Japan (1933-), reigned 1989-2019

明仁宗.definition: Ming Renzong, temple name of fourth Ming emperor Zhu Gaochi 朱高熾|朱高炽[Zhu1 Gao1 chi4]

明修棧道，暗渡陳倉.pinyin: ming2 xiu1 zhan4 dao4 , an4 du4 Chen2 cang1
明修棧道，暗渡陳倉.definition: lit. repair the plank road by day while secretly crossing the Wei River 渭河[Wei4 He2] at Chencang (idiom, refers to a stratagem used by Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] in 206 BC against Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3] of Chu); fig. to feign one thing while doing another; to cheat under cover of a diversion

明光.definition: Mingguang, a county-level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui

明光市.definition: Mingguang, a county-level city in Chuzhou 滁州[Chu2 zhou1], Anhui

明兒.definition: (coll.) tomorrow; one of these days; some day

明初.definition: the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)

明十三陵.definition: the Ming tombs (mausoleum park of the Ming emperors in Changping district of Beijing)

明古魯.definition: Bengkulu (Indonesian town on the south coast of Sumatra)

明古魯市.definition: Bengkulu (Indonesian town on the south coast of Sumatra)

明史.definition: History of the Ming Dynasty, twenty fourth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Zhang Tingyu 張廷玉|张廷玉[Zhang1 Ting2 yu4] in 1739 during the Qing Dynasty, 332 scrolls

明和.definition: Minghe, rail station in South Taiwan; Meiwa (Japanese reign name 1764-1772); Meiwa (common name for Japanese companies or schools)

明哲保身.definition: a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom); to put one's own safety before matters of principle

明天啟.definition: Tianqi Emperor, reign name of fifteenth Ming emperor Zhu Youxiao 朱由校[Zhu1 You2 xiao4] (1605-1627), reigned 1620-1627, temple name 明熹宗[Ming2 Xi1 zong1]

明天見.definition: see you tomorrow; (coll., jocular) food that passes through the digestive system more or less intact (esp. enoki mushrooms)

明太祖.definition: Ming Taizu, temple name of first Ming emperor Hongwu 洪武[Hong2 wu3]

明孝陵.definition: Ming tombs in Nanjing, tomb of founding Ming emperor Zhu Yuanzhang 朱元璋[Zhu1 Yuan2 zhang1], a World Heritage site

明宣宗.definition: temple name of fifth Ming emperor Xuande 宣德[Xuan1 de2]

明察暗訪.definition: open enquiries and secret search (idiom); to investigate openly and in secret; taking information from all sides

明察秋毫.definition: lit. seeing clearly the downy feathers of autumn (idiom, from Mencius); fig. perceptive of even the finest detail

明實錄.definition: Ming Veritable Records, imperial annals of the emperors of the Ming Dynasty

明尼阿波利斯.pinyin: Ming2 ni2 a1 bo1 li4 si1
明尼阿波利斯.definition: Minneapolis, a nameplace in the USA, notably in Minnesota

明山.definition: Mingshan, a district of Benxi 本溪市[Ben3xi1 Shi4], Liaoning

明山區.definition: Mingshan, a district of Benxi 本溪市[Ben3xi1 Shi4], Liaoning

明崗暗哨.definition: both covert and undercover (officers) keeping watch (idiom)

明德學院.definition: Middlebury College, private liberal arts college in Middlebury, Vermont

明成祖.definition: Ming Chengzu, temple name of third Ming Emperor Yongle 永樂|永乐[Yong3 le4]

明文.definition: to state in writing (laws, rules etc)

明日黃花.definition: lit. chrysanthemums after the Double Ninth Festival (idiom); fig. outdated; thing of the past; dead letter

明月.definition: bright moon; refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark; CL:輪|轮[lun2]

明月清風.definition: see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]

明朗.definition: bright; clear; obvious; forthright; open-minded; bright and cheerful

明末.definition: late Ming; first half of the 17th century

明末清初.definition: late Ming and early Qing; around the middle of the 17th century

明查暗訪.definition: open enquiries and secret search (idiom); to investigate openly and in secret; taking information from all sides

明槍好躲，暗箭難防.pinyin: ming2 qiang1 hao3 duo3 , an4 jian4 nan2 fang2
明槍好躲，暗箭難防.definition: lit. easy to dodge the spear in the open, hard to avoid a stab in the dark (idiom); it is hard to guard against secret conspiracies

明槍易躲，暗箭難防.pinyin: ming2 qiang1 yi4 duo3 , an4 jian4 nan2 fang2
明槍易躲，暗箭難防.definition: lit. easy to dodge the spear in the open, hard to avoid a stab in the dark (idiom); it is hard to guard against secret conspiracies

明武宗.definition: Ming Wuzong, temple name of eleventh Ming emperor Zhengde 正德[Zheng4 de2]

明水.definition: Mingshui county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

明水縣.definition: Mingshui county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

明治.definition: Meiji, Japanese era name, corresponding to the reign (1868-1912) of the Meiji emperor

明溪.definition: Mingxi, a county in Sanming City 三明市[San1ming2 Shi4], Fujian

明溪縣.definition: Mingxi, a county in Sanming City 三明市[San1ming2 Shi4], Fujian

明滅.definition: to flicker; to flash on and off; to brighten and fade

明熹宗.definition: Ming Xizong, temple name of fifteenth Ming emperor Tianqi 明天啟|明天启[Ming2 Tian1 qi3]

明爭暗鬥.definition: (idiom) to fight openly and maneuver covertly

明珠暗投.definition: to cast pearls before swine (idiom); not to get proper recognition for one's talents

明理.definition: sensible; reasonable; an obvious reason, truth or fact; to understand the reason or reasoning

明白.definition: clear; obvious; unequivocal; sensible; reasonable; to understand; to realize

明眸皓齒.definition: to have bright eyes and white teeth

明眼人.definition: perspicacious person; sb with a discerning eye; sighted person (as opposed to blind)

明瞭.definition: to understand clearly; to be clear about; plain; clear

明知.definition: to be fully aware of; to know perfectly well

明知山有虎，偏向虎山行.pinyin: ming2 zhi1 shan1 you3 hu3 , pian1 xiang4 hu3 shan1 xing2
明知山有虎，偏向虎山行.definition: lit. to willfully go towards the mountain although knowing that it has tigers (idiom); fig. to take a risk despite knowing the dangers

明知故問.definition: (idiom) to ask a question, already knowing the answer

明確.definition: clear-cut; definite; explicit; to clarify; to specify; to make definite

明碼.definition: non-secret code (such as Morse code, Chinese telegraph code, ASCII etc); plaintext (cryptography); (of prices) clearly marked

明示.definition: to state explicitly; to clearly indicate

明窗淨几.definition: lit. clear window and clean table (idiom); fig. bright and clean (room)

明細.definition: clear and detailed; definite; details (are as follows:)

明細表.definition: schedule; subsidiary ledger; a detailed list

明處.definition: clear place; out in the open

明裡暗裡.definition: both publicly and privately; both overtly and secretly; both explicitly and implicitly

明言.definition: to say clearly; to argue clearly; to pronounce; pronounced

明鏡.definition: mirror (as a metaphor for sth beautiful, bright and flat – such as a lake – or sth that provides clarity and insight)

明麗.definition: bright and beautiful; (of a landscape) gorgeous; (of a color) vibrant
